title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\SecurityPolicyAdaptiveProtectionConfigLayer7DdosDefenseConfig
name: SecurityPolicyAdaptiveProtectionConfigLayer7DdosDefenseConfig
description:
Configuration options for L7 DDoS detection.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.SecurityPolicyAdaptiveProtectionConfigLayer7DdosDefenseConfig

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enable
params.description: If set to true, enables CAAP for L7 DDoS detection.

params.name: data.rule_visibility
params.description: Rule visibility can be one of the following: STANDARD - opaque rules. (default) PREMIUM - transparent rules. Check the RuleVisibility enum for the list of possible values.
